content_html: A program that provides subsidies to farmers based on the quantity of milk they produce has become highly effective in Baglung. Farmers who collect and market their milk through cooperatives have received a subsidy of five rupees per liter. In the fiscal year 2081/82, farmers associated with eight milk production coo
